episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics including the comforting behavior of baby elephants, synchronized blinking among moviegoers, the long storage life of apples, and ancient accounts of giant ants in India.

facts.fact: Baby elephants suck their trunks for comfort.
If you buy an apple today, it might have been taken off the tree in May 2014.
The first Western eye witness account of India described it as having ants the size of foxes.
